participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, enjoys creating experiences for others.
participant_1.background: I need a home that is close to a music venue and has a large backyard for my boys to play in. I have a tattoo on my back that they don't know about. I cook cheap but delicious food that my friends love and use my apple devices to keep my life organized. I like to cook breakfast on Sundays. I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about art, values relationships and experiences.
participant_2.background: I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I go visit them sometimes. I went to college. I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal. I have a cat named Seven of Nine.

content.text: How is your Sunday going?
I am doing well! I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal.
That sounds like a wonderful way to spend a Sunday!
Thanks! I have a cat named Seven of Nine.
What a cute name! I love Star Trek.
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.
That sounds like an interesting job! How did you get into that?
I went to college for photography and started doing wedding photography on the side. I eventually turned it into my full-time job.
That is awesome! Do you like your job?
I love it! I get to meet new people and help them celebrate their special day.
That sounds amazing! I am glad you have found a job that you love.
Thanks! I am too.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to cook, go to concerts, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too.
What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I also love to make breakfast on Sundays.
I love pasta dishes too! I love to make chicken parmesan.
That is one of my favorites too!
I love to cook for my friends and family. I love to see their faces light up when they taste my food.
That is so sweet! I love to cook for my family too
